## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c62594db29ca0473a517e2d3ed643575d938a4d43a58ee4420b2b304b8121b32)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'opbox-seller-shop-service' @ 99.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
